section.title: opportunities creating new sources for Opportunity Source
section.para: To create a new Opportunity Source, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Opportunity Source, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a name to define the Opportunity Source.
Enter a brief description of the Opportunity Source.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating an Opportunity Source, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Opportunity Source and adds it to the master list of Opportunity Sources.
